tasks.description: In prepare_files_and_directory.sh, edit SOURCE_CODE_DIR to your upload directory, edit NEW_DIR to create a new directory to store required scripts and log folder

tasks.task_name: Run streaming script and map script
tasks.description: In run_streaming_and_map_script.sh, edit NEW_DIR to point to the new directory created
Input tweets_map.png path and show tweets map
start Zeppelin server and load analysis notebook
